Advanced data
Item ID13513

The Book of arcane knowledge is a reward from helping NPCs find their requested book around the Arceuus Library. It grants players a choice of experience in either Magic or Runecraft. When used, it grants Magic experience equal to the player's Magic level times 11 or Runecraft experience equal to their Runecraft level times 4.

Similarly to the book of knowledge, this item cannot be placed within a player's bank and is consumed after one use.

You can use the Arceuus Library Books Calculator to determine how many books are needed to reach a target level or XP.


The tables below show the progress each tome will grant.
